readable.title: 1088767354_2acee738cf
readable.content: A woman in a red costume to the left of a man and woman standing together . A woman wearing a red costume looks at two other people standing on a street . A young woman in a red sequined costume and feather stands on the sidewalk . The girl in the salmon colored bikini is standing next to two young people ; one is wearing a black outfit and the other is drinking pop . Two young people are approached by a flamboyant young woman dressed in a red bikini and a red feathered headress .
